protective_factors: Explicitly stated she 'couldn't do that to them' (family)
Strong family connection/obligations serving as a deterrent
No history of attempts (per shared context)
risk_factors: Presence of passive death ideation (Category 1: 'wish I could disappear')
Significant neurovegetative symptoms (*Early Morning Awakening*, *Weight Loss*)
clinical_actions: Safety planning reinforced (reviewing denial of intent)
Close follow-up necessary due to dose increase (100mg *Sertraline*)
Psychoeducation on passive vs. active ideation provided by DOCTOR
